Package io.github.shooter.multiplayer

package io.github.shooter.multiplayer
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    io.github.shooter
     
    io.github.shooter.game
     
    io.github.shooter.screens
     
  • Class
    Description
    ClientListener
    Listens for server messages and updates the GameClient accordingly.
    ClientListener.BulletListener
    Listener interface for receiving bullet fired events from other players.
    ClientListener.PlayerHitListener
    Listener interface for receiving notifications when this player is hit.
    GameClient
    Handles client-side connection to game server, sending and receiving multiplayer data.
    GameClient.PlayerData
    Stores data and state about another player in the game.
    GameServer
    This class handles starting and stopping the game server.
    Network
    Holds all network message types and helper method to register them.
    Network.BulletUpdate
    Info about a bullet fired, including position and direction.
    Network.KillFeed
    Shows who killed who, used for kill feed display.
    Network.PingRequest
    Sent by client to check ping latency.
    Network.PingResponse
    Sent by server back to client to reply to ping.
    Network.PlayerDisconnected
    Sent when a player disconnects from server.
    Network.PlayerHit
    Sent when a player gets hit, with damage info.
    Network.PlayerUpdate
    Info about a player sent to update their position, health, rotation, username, and kills.
    ServerListener
    Listens for messages from clients on the server side.
